name: What the World Needs Now Is Love
description: First drop on H=N & first minted acrylic painting by Sam Stevens aka Dreams Lost In Time. Part of the on-going series, "Event Horizon". The concept of the Event Horizon series is to reimagine what energy could look like as it crosses the event horizon of a black hole, in some distance galaxy throughout the infinite universe. Acrylic painting on a classic vinyl record.
